storyInfo: Bison, a young messenger, is attacked by the Siracusan Mafia, but Exusiai and Croissant from Rhodes Island come to his rescue. Elsewhere in an abandoned alley, the enemy falls into Emperor's overblown trap.

attributes.content: 6:44 PM \ Clear
Lungmen Ring Expressway, Car
Young Master?
attributes.name: Butler

attributes.content: Young Master, are you asleep?
attributes.name: Butler

attributes.content: Hm, oh... Where are we?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: We will soon arrive at the rendezvous point. Do clear your head, Young Master. Penguin Logistics is already there waiting for you.
attributes.name: Butler

attributes.content: Mm. Right.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: You seem exhausted.
attributes.name: Butler

attributes.content: I'm fine.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Forgive my indiscretion, Sir, but you do seem to have made this decision in some haste. You know of course that you may at any time share any matters that trouble you.
attributes.name: Butler

attributes.content: ...My father... he definitely has his own ideas.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: But all I have to do is get Penguin Logistics on board. Then those guys won't be able to get between me and my father ever again.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: You are the youngest Messenger in the history of your family, Young Master. You perform all of your duties impeccably. Surely that will be enough.
attributes.name: Butler

attributes.content: Maybe. But who knows if they'll feel the same way.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Young Master...
attributes.name: Butler

attributes.content: Looking out at the city, all I can think about is how almost all of Lungmen's Messenger firms belong to my father.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Penguin Logistics is the last. And the most independent. And the one with a ton of weird rumors swirling around it.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: My father gets along pretty well with Mr. Emperor, but we have to do more to really get them. Or at least I do.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: That is why I worry, Young Master. I am well aware Penguin Logistics is a most peculiar organization.
attributes.name: Butler

attributes.content: Don't look at me like that. I got this.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: You might change your expression as well, Young Master. Perhaps if you smiled more, like the boys your age.
attributes.name: Butler

attributes.content: It's Sauin tonight. You could go out on the town with your friends.
attributes.name: Butler

attributes.content: ...real funny. Me not having friends is a joke to you, huh?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Heavens no! Perish the thought! Haha.
attributes.name: Butler

attributes.content: Dreadfully sorry, Young Master. Do you have your shield with you?
attributes.name: Butler

attributes.content: What's up?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: I'm afraid we're being watched.
attributes.name: Butler

attributes.content: Target sighted. You ready?
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Gah, this fuse is still all...
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Just do it already.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Nng... an explosion?!
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Hold on, Young Master!
attributes.name: Butler

attributes.content: Target sighted. He's still up.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Bring him in. Quick.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: (They bombed out the road...? But who...?)
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: (Shit... my vision's... all blurry...)
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Report.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Lots of witnesses, but I don't see the other targets.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Hold up, there's somebody in the smoke there!
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Another survivor? You gotta-
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Nnng...
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Hey? Hey!
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: You got whacked that easy?
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Talk about a hackneyed mob movie plot,
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Penguin Logistics.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Ooh, sounds like you passed Screenwriting 101.
But like, throwing up a roadblock on a suburban highway and burying a bomb on the side there. Isn't that also really cliche?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Demolition's just a hobby of mine. Take a look around and I think you'll find things ain't so simple.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Damn. How much Originium did that mook use in his bomb? The Rat King'll have our balls for breakfast if he finds out.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: We found a Penguin Logistics Messenger. It's Exusiai. Looks like she bumped off the wrecking crew...
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Do I look blind to you? Where's the wolf? Texas?
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Dunno. Don't see her.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Fuggedaboutit. Surround 'em. Let's get this done.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: An ambush, huh? They're nothing if not thorough.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Hey, can you move? Your limbs are all shaky.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Yeah, kinda... You must be... Exusiai?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: That's me! And you're... uh... Whatsisname!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Bison.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: We... we should get out of here.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Before you get all mopey, that old butlery guy is a-okay.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Really?!
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: I put him by the roadside for a minute, but he doesn't look like he needs much help... anyway!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Exusiai, Messenger of Penguin Logistics, and the little rich kid there, give it up. Come with us nice and easy-like.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: All these fresh faces, must be your relatives from Siracusa? Didn't you teach them how things work in Lungmen?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: None of your damned business. We're cleaning you out for good this time.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Oh come on... You've been in Lungmen so long you turned basic. Grabbing territory like a common thug.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I guess at least some of the Siracusan Mafia can do more than just bar brawls.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Grr... I'll teach you to look down on a Sicilian. *Lungmen Swearing* Get 'em!
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Awright, looks like I'm right on time!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Croissant, you made it!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: But they're all so ornery. What're we gonna do?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: The usual. You clear a path, I'll bring up the rear, we split the completion bonus.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Now that's all ya had to say! Yeeehawww!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Th- that crazy broad charged right through!
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: ...get after them. But not too close. Wait for backup.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Got it!
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: You lost 'em, cazzo.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Look, I ain't a kidnapping expert. The rest of Penguin Logistics never showed and we weren't about to go traipsing into downtown Lungmen by ourselves.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: I don't wanna hear excuses. There's a car headed your way. Convertible. Old friends inside.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: ...already?
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Gah, damn it. Another dead end?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: It's a buncha old ruins nobody's touched fer ages. Lemme just make my own hole already.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: H- hold up! Where are we going?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: There they are! It's a dead end! We got 'em!
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: It's game over, isn't it?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Oh yeah!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: You have an idea?!
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: We haven't properly introduced ourselves, have we?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Rub 'em out!
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Now's not the time for this! We've got more important things to deal with!
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Nah.
This is important. Real important.
We got a serious emphasis on corporate culture. And today's culture buzzword is 'courtesy.'
I just came up with it.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: It's Emperor! Somebody call the boss!
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: There's someone else with him!
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Came up empty, Exusiai.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Not every Siracusan mook's a total moron. We'll get 'em next time, don't worry.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: But first, I've got to introduce you to Penguin Logistics's newest temp worker: Bison.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: They blocked the only way out. We- we have to fight through!
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Get down on the ground. You don't have to die.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Woah! Settle down, we just have to hold out until the boss...!
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Hold out?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Hit the lights.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Agh! It's so bright! Where'd that spotlight come from?!
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Welcome to Penguin Logistics, little doggies.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Now I can see you. And that means you're on land that belongs to the Penguin Empire.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Now I hate to bother you, but I'm gonna have to see your landing visa. You got it on you?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: No?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Then I think we gotta send you crying home to your mamas.
attributes.name: Emperor
